feedback.summary: Excellent understanding of React and state management. Good communication.
Strong problem-solving skills, code quality and organization were solid.
Knowledgeable but had trouble demonstrating deeper React hooks understanding.

aiAdvice.general: Focus on clarifying your thought process and providing detailed, structured answers. Demonstrate familiarity with advanced React patterns and performance optimizations.
aiAdvice.improveTechnicalSkills: Review advanced React Hooks usage (useMemo, useCallback). Practice coding challenges focusing on modular code and design patterns.
aiAdvice.improveProblemSolving: Break down problems step-by-step out loud. Use examples or analogies to clarify complex ideas.

feedback.summary: Strong Node.js knowledge with good database design principles.
Knows Node.js but struggled with complex systems. Communication was okay.

aiAdvice.general: Brush up on advanced system design and architecture. Improve clarity when walking through solutions.
aiAdvice.improveTechnicalSkills: Build or contribute to a project involving distributed systems or microservices to showcase deeper knowledge.
aiAdvice.improveProblemSolving: Practice whiteboarding complex flows, discuss trade-offs, and clarify assumptions early.
